sentence: After a Perdue rally and $3 million spent by him and his allies since February throwing mud at Brian Kemp, the governor still holds a double-digit lead,? said Cody Hall, Kemp's campaign spokesman.
title: Kemp, Raffensperger lead Trump-backed challengers in Georgia: poll

sentence: After a Perdue rally and $3 million spent by the former senator and his allies since February throwing mud at Brian Kemp, the Governor still holds a double-digit lead,? campaign spokesman Cody Hall said in a statement.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Possible Runoff Could Be Warning Sign for Kemp in Governor's Primary
